snippet: Justice Chaskalson was the first presiding judge of the post-apartheid Constitutional Court and served as chief justice from 2001 to 2005.
abstract: Arthur Chaskalson, first presiding judge of post-apartheid Constitutional Court in South Africa, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Justice Chaskalson was the first presiding judge of the post-apartheid Constitutional Court and served as chief justice from 2001 to 2005.

headline.seo: Arthur Chaskalson, South African Chief Justice, Dies at 81
headline.main: Arthur Chaskalson, Chief South African Jurist, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Arthur Chaskalson, 81, Chief South African Jurist, Dies
